column2: "If you're planning on going any further, I suggest you wait a minute. Not that I'll stop you if you want to carry on."
"Don't worry, that's an ARKS member doing that. She should get bored and leave soon."
"Honestly, you'd think she'd never even heard of self-control. Well, it's none of my business."
"The noise has stopped. You can go on now, can't you? See you around."
